attributes.comment:
We are in the process of our second adoption from China with unexpected
increased wait times to referrals. We will already have to pay to refile for our I171
and also be refingerprinted. The increased fees will be another additional cost
that we did not forsee when we started our second adoption from China. Our
government should assist us during a difficult process instead of adding to the
stress of internation adoption. If domestic adoption were a certainity we would
have attempted that route to become parents, but unfortunately that has not
worked out for most families who have attempted domestic adoption. I implore
you to assist familes who have already struggled with the emotional and financial
straits of infertility. Please due not increase the fees for fingerprinting and I171s.
Thank you for your time.

Shirley Baumann

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Shirley J. Baumann
